title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Peyton and Eli Manning on New MNF MegaCast, Brotherly Bond
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Peyton and Eli Manning on New MNF MegaCast, Brotherly Bond
description:
Peyton and Eli Manning join Colin to discuss the launch of Monday Night Football with Peyton and Eli, how it will differ from a traditional game broadcast (1:00), what elite QB trait Eli possessed from an early age (12:00), what Eli learned from Peyton when he visited him at Tennessee (15:00), how they learned to adapt to living in new cities (22:00), Eli's memory of his first trip to New York City (24:00), the reality check Tony Dungy gave Peyton upon arriving in Indy (27:00), Tom Coughlin's first "purple moment" with Eli (31:00), the comment Colin made on-air about Peyton and his center Jeff Saturday (33:00), the unusual drill that helped Peyton win a Super Bowl with the Colts (35:00), and the prank that Eli's center Shaun O'Hara played on him (36:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
